Class MaxCoverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upv.staq.testar.graph.algorithms.AbstractWalker
      • es.upv.staq.testar.graph.algorithms.MaxCoverage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWalker

    public class MaxCoverage
extends AbstractWalker
    A walker that tries to explore the complete SUT IU space. Status: experimental && under dev.
    Author:
    Urko Rueda Molina (alias: urueda)

      • calculateReward

        public double calculateReward(IEnvironment env,
                              IGraphState state,
                              IGraphAction action)
        Description copied from interface: IWalker
        Calculates a rewarding score (0.0 .. 1.0), which determines how interesting is the state' action.
        Returns:
        A rewarding score between 0.0 (no interest at all) and 1.0 (maximum interest).
